setting.atmosphere: Gothic elegance meets cutting-edge technology, holographic paintings flicker in darkened halls
setting.weather: Torrential rain, electromagnetic storm disrupting communications

victim.name: Lord Reginald Thornfield
victim.causeOfDeath: Neural implant overload causing catastrophic brain hemorrhage
victim.description: Ruthless businessman who made his fortune in neural enhancement technology. Recently discovered to have been stealing consciousness patterns from test subjects for his immortality project.

characters.name: Lady Victoria Thornfield
characters.personality: Cold, calculating, maintains perfect composure but seethes underneath
characters.background: Met Reginald when she was his top researcher. Married him after he stole her consciousness transfer breakthrough and claimed it as his own.
characters.motive: Discovered Reginald was planning to divorce her and erase her memories of their research
characters.alibi: In the virtual meditation chamber from 10:00 PM to 11:30 PM

relationships.dr-marcus-chen: Former research partner, knows her true genius
relationships.elena-volkov: Sees her as competition for the estate

secretKnowledge: Reginald's neural implant had a backdoor she programmed
The consciousness theft victims included her own sister
characters.speechPattern: Clipped, precise, uses technical terminology casually
characters.greeting: Detective. I suppose you'll want to know about my movements. I was in deep meditation when my husband died. The chamber logs will confirm it.

characters.name: Jasper Thornfield
characters.personality: Passionate, idealistic, prone to angry outbursts
characters.background: Reginald's son from first marriage. Leads protests against neural enhancement technology after seeing what it did to his mother.
characters.motive: Father's company destroyed his mother's mind in early experiments
characters.alibi: In the library arguing with Elena Volkov from 10:15 PM to 10:45 PM

relationships.lady-victoria-thornfield: Despises her for replacing his mother
relationships.dr-marcus-chen: Sees him as complicit in father's crimes
relationships.alfred-pemberton: Treats him kindly, sees him as only real family

secretKnowledge: His mother is still alive but brain-damaged in a care facility
Has been planning to expose the consciousness theft
characters.speechPattern: Emotional, uses activist rhetoric, voice rises when agitated
characters.greeting: You're here about him, aren't you? Good. Someone should finally investigate what that monster was really doing.

characters.name: Dr. Marcus Chen
characters.personality: Brilliant but morally flexible, nervous under pressure
characters.background: Helped develop the neural implant technology but grew concerned about ethical violations. Was planning to whistleblow.
characters.motive: Reginald threatened to frame him for the illegal experiments
characters.alibi: In the neural lab running diagnostics from 10:00 PM to 11:15 PM

relationships.lady-victoria-thornfield: Respects her brilliance, fears her ruthlessness
relationships.jasper-thornfield: Guilt over what happened to his mother
relationships.elena-volkov: Knows she's been stealing corporate data
relationships.detective-maya-singh: Eager to cooperate, hopes to avoid prosecution

secretKnowledge: The murder weapon could be a modified neural interface
Victoria wrote the original consciousness transfer code
characters.speechPattern: Technical jargon mixed with nervous stammering when stressed
characters.greeting: Detective Singh? I... I've been expecting you. There are things about Lord Thornfield's work you need to know.

characters.name: Elena Volkov
characters.role: Personal assistant and secret corporate spy
characters.personality: Charming facade hiding calculating nature, expert manipulator
characters.background: Placed in Thornfield's household by a rival corporation to steal neural enhancement secrets. Has been feeding them data for two years.
characters.motive: Reginald discovered her true identity and threatened exposure
characters.alibi: With Jasper in the library, then alone in her room by 10:45 PM
secretKnowledge: Has recordings of Reginald's illegal activities
Jasper kissed her during their argument
characters.speechPattern: Slight Russian accent, flirtatious when useful, turns cold when cornered
characters.greeting: Detective Singh, how thrilling. A real murder in this dreary place. How may I assist your investigation?

characters.name: Alfred Pemberton
characters.personality: Proper, observant, fiercely loyal to the Thornfield name if not the man
characters.background: Served the Thornfield family for 30 years. Former MI6 operative who retired after a mission went wrong.
characters.motive: Discovered Reginald was selling neural weapon tech to terrorist organizations
characters.alibi: Serving drinks in the drawing room at 10:30 PM, multiple witnesses

relationships.jasper-thornfield: Paternal affection, knew him since birth
relationships.elena-volkov: Knows she's a spy, hasn't revealed it

secretKnowledge: Has surveillance footage of everyone's movements
Knows about the hidden panic room
characters.speechPattern: Formal British, never uses contractions, subtle military phrases
characters.greeting: Detective Singh. I have prepared the drawing room for your interviews. The staff are at your disposal.

characters.name: Detective Maya Singh
characters.role: Neural crimes specialist called to investigate
characters.personality: Sharp, empathetic, haunted by a case involving neural tampering
characters.background: Lost her partner to a neural hacker. Now specializes in tech-related murders.
characters.alibi: Arrived at 11:45 PM, after the murder

relationships.lady-victoria-thornfield: Suspects her immediately but needs proof
relationships.jasper-thornfield: Old acquaintance, wants to believe he's innocent
relationships.dr-marcus-chen: Sees him as weak link to break

secretKnowledge: Neural implant murders leave specific signatures
Has history with Jasper from activist days
characters.speechPattern: Direct questions, active listening, quotes poetry when thinking
characters.greeting: I'm Detective Singh, Neural Crimes Division. I'll need to speak with everyone who was in the manor tonight.

locations.name: Neural Laboratory
locations.description: Sterile white room filled with quantum computers and neural interface pods. Holographic brain scans flicker on the walls. A faint smell of ozone permeates the air.

locations.name: Master Study
locations.description: Dark wood paneling embedded with hidden displays. Reginald's body slumps in his chair, neural implant sparking. Ancient books mix with holographic data streams.

locations.name: Virtual Meditation Chamber
locations.description: Soundproof room with a single neural interface chair. Soothing holograms of nature scenes play on loop. The air recycling system hums quietly.

locations.name: Library
locations.description: Two-story room with physical books and digital archives. A half-empty whiskey bottle sits on a side table. Rain pounds against tall windows.

locations.name: Drawing Room
locations.description: Elegant space with adaptive furniture and a holographic fireplace. Silver serving trays bear the remnants of the evening's drinks. Classical music plays softly.

locations.name: Server Room
locations.description: Hidden behind a bookshelf, filled with quantum servers storing the manor's data. Temperature-controlled, with biometric locks. Status lights blink in patterns.

evidence.name: Modified Neural Interface
evidence.description: A neural headset with unusual modifications
evidence.detailedDescription: Standard Thornfield Industries neural interface with custom firmware installed. Timestamp shows modification at 9:45 PM. Capable of delivering lethal neural feedback.

evidence.name: Meditation Chamber Access Logs
evidence.detailedDescription: Shows Victoria entered at 10:00 PM but the biometric data is inconsistent - heartrate and brainwaves suggest a pre-recorded pattern, not live meditation.

evidence.name: Encrypted Email Thread
evidence.description: Partially decoded threats between Reginald and unknown party
evidence.detailedDescription: Reginald threatening to 'erase' someone who betrayed him. Timestamp: 8:30 PM. Encryption signature matches Victoria's personal algorithm.

evidence.name: Security Camera Data
evidence.detailedDescription: Most footage from 10:30-11:00 PM is corrupted by the electromagnetic storm, but one frame shows a figure in Victoria's distinctive dress near the study at 10:35 PM.

evidence.name: Project Lazarus Files
evidence.description: Hidden research documents about consciousness extraction
evidence.detailedDescription: Details illegal experiments on unwilling subjects. Victoria's sister is listed as 'Subject 007'. Notes indicate Reginald planned to steal Victoria's consciousness next.

evidence.name: Damaged Photograph
evidence.description: Old photo of Jasper's mother with neural interface burns
evidence.detailedDescription: Shows extensive neural damage from early Thornfield Industries experiments. Written on back: 'Never forget what he did to her - J'

evidence.name: Concealed Data Extractor
evidence.description: Miniature device for stealing neural patterns
evidence.detailedDescription: Russian tech, designed to copy neural data during handshakes. Has Reginald's partial pattern from earlier today. Could theoretically cause feedback damage.

evidence.name: Lipstick-Stained Glass
evidence.description: Crystal tumbler with distinctive lipstick mark
evidence.detailedDescription: Elena's signature red lipstick on rim. Whiskey drugged with mild sedative. Time stamp on smart glass: 10:20 PM.

evidence.name: Neural Diagnostic Report
evidence.description: Dr. Chen's analysis of the manor's neural network
evidence.detailedDescription: Shows anomalous activity in the neural network at 10:32 PM - someone activated a remote neural interface from inside the manor. Signature matches the modified interface.

evidence.name: Classified Intelligence Files
evidence.description: Alfred's hidden dossier on Reginald's weapons dealing
evidence.detailedDescription: Evidence that Reginald sold neural weapon tech to terrorist cells. Alfred's handwritten note: 'The family honour must be preserved, even if the man cannot be.'

evidence.name: Backdoor Access Code
evidence.detailedDescription: Code comments in Victoria's coding style. Allows remote activation of implant overload. Last accessed: 10:32 PM from IP address traced to meditation chamber's network node.

evidence.name: Unsent Message
evidence.detailedDescription: Timestamp 10:25 PM: 'Elena, despite everything you represent, I can't stop thinking about our kiss. After tonight, everything changes...'

evidence.name: Biometric Key Fob
evidence.description: Access device for hidden panic room
evidence.detailedDescription: Alfred's thumbprint activated. Last used two weeks ago. Panic room contains survival supplies and encrypted communication equipment.

solution.method: Used the backdoor she programmed into Reginald's neural implant to trigger a fatal overload remotely while establishing an alibi in the meditation chamber
solution.motive: Reginald stole her research, was planning to divorce her and erase her memories, and she discovered he had used her technology to harvest her sister's consciousness
solution.explanation: Lady Victoria discovered Reginald's plan to steal her consciousness and erase her memories of their research - just as he'd done to her sister. She used the meditation chamber's network node to remotely access the backdoor she'd programmed into his neural implant years ago, triggering a fatal overload at 10:32 PM. The meditation chamber's logs were spoofed with pre-recorded biometric data to establish her alibi. The modified neural interface in the lab was her backup plan if the remote access failed.

timeline.event: Reginald sends threatening email about erasing someone who betrayed him
Neural interface modified in the laboratory
Victoria enters meditation chamber, begins spoofing biometric data
Jasper and Elena begin arguing in the library
Elena drugs whiskey glass during argument with Jasper
Jasper writes unsent love confession to Elena
Alfred serves drinks in drawing room, electromagnetic storm intensifies
Victoria remotely triggers neural implant overload from meditation chamber
Reginald collapses in his study, dies within minutes
Security camera catches figure in Victoria's dress near study
Jasper and Elena end argument, separate
Dr. Chen finishes diagnostics, discovers anomaly
